# init(layoutSize:elementKind:containerAnchor:)

**Initializer**

Creates a supplementary item of the specified size and element kind, with an anchor relative to a container.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor convenience init(layoutSize: NSCollectionLayoutSize, elementKind: String, containerAnchor: NSCollectionLayoutAnchor)
```

## Creating a supplementary item

- **init(layoutSize:elementKind:containerAnchor:itemAnchor:)**: Creates a supplementary item of the specified size and element kind, an anchor relative to a container, and an anchor relative to an item.
